data.title: Bud Moore PBA50 Players Championship
data.meta_description: View PlayersGame by Game ScoringLane Pairings
data.text:
Sunday, July 14

A Squad + top half of B Squad Practice: 9 a.m. – 10:15 a.m.

Bottom half of B Squad and C Squad Practice: 11:15 a.m. – 12:30 p.m.

Monday, July 15

A Squad: 9 a.m. – 12 p.m.

B Squad: 12:30 p.m. – 3:30 p.m.

C Squad: 4 p.m. – 7 p.m.

No re-oil between squads

(6 games of qualifying)

Tuesday, July 16

B Squad: 9 a.m. – 12 p.m.

C Squad: 12:30 p.m. – 3:30 p.m.

A Squad: 4 p.m. – 7 p.m.

No re-oil between squads

(6 games of qualifying)

Wednesday, July 17

C Squad: 9 a.m. – 12 p.m.

A Squad: 12:30 p.m. – 3:30 p.m.

B Squad: 4 p.m. – 7 p.m.

No re-oil between squads

(6 games of qualifying)

Top 24 advance

All pins carry forward

Thursday, July 18

Match Play Round One: 9 a.m. – 1 p.m.

(8 games)

No Re-oil

Match Play Round Two: 3 p.m. – 7 p.m.

(8 Games)

Friday, July 19

Match Play Round Three: 9 a.m. – 1 p.m.

(8 games)

Top 5 bowlers advance to a stepladder final at Bill Moore’s home.

Re-oil

Drop all pins

Stepladder Practice: 6:40 – 7 p.m.

Stepladder Matches: 7 – 8:30 p.m.

Tournament Host:

David M. Debat, Bill Moore

Tournament Host Center

Bowl America Bull Run

10641 Balls Ford Rd.

Manassas, VA 20109

(703) 368-6256

Eligibility

Participant must be at least 50 years of age to enter a PBA50 Tour event.

Non-members:

Non-members are not eligible for the Bud Moore PBA50 Players Championship.

Maximum Field

126

Point Values

Tier 1 Points

Priority Entries

Priority entries open Thursday, February 1. Entry priority will be given in the following order, provided players regardless of their status, have entered by the entry deadline date, which is 14 days prior to the official start date (practice day) of each PBA50 Tour event.

PBA Tour and PBA50 Tour Title Holders

Top 50 2023 PBA50 Tour Point Leaders

Eligible PBA Members

NOTE: Entrants will be placed into the tournament based on priority succession, plus date and time the entry was received online. If the tournament fills by the deadline entry date, remaining entrants will be placed on standby and notified if spots come available.

Anyone needing instructions on how to enter online can contact membership services at (206) 332-9688.

Entry Fees

PBA50 Members: $495

OIL PATTERN INFO:

Webb 38

2024 PBA Approved Equipment

The 2024 list of acceptable Urethane and Urethane-Like equipment made at 78.0HD+ is available on the schedule page under “quick links”.
